name: Leap in the Clouds
description:
Leap in the Clouds! Use your Leap Motion to complete the levels of moving a ball from the green flame to the red flame.

As mentioned, you must have a Leap Motion controller to be able to play this game.

This game was created for the Leap Motion 3D Jam.

All the other jam entries are here: https://itch.io/jam/leapmotion3djam/entries
